name: Walnut Espresso Date Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tea bags (in one cup boiling hot water)
2 tsp coffee powder, with a bit of hot water for frosting

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the dates and add the hot tea mixture on it and add the baking soda. Let this rest for 2 hours, so the dates get very soft and mash them a bit afterwards.
Beat the sugar and butter till creamy, then add one egg at a time. add the almond essence at this stage.
Add the semolina, self raising flour, mashed dates and chopped nuts, fold them well and bake for 40 minutes at 180Â°C.
When the cake cools completely, beat together the frosting ingredients and pour over the cake. garnish with walnuts.
